testcase.classname: Barnes and Noble Login, navigation and purchase functionality.
testcase.name: 1. As a valid user, user can log in to B&N, navigate to a link, and search for a product
testcase.skipped: Given user is able to browse to the Barnes and Noble Website................undefined When user lands on home page "Online Bookstore: Books, NOOK ebooks, Music, Movies & Toys | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can click on the sign in button...................................undefined And enter "axelajp@gmail.com" as email address..............................undefined And enter "Watermelons1" as password........................................undefined And click on login button...................................................undefined When user is logged into the "Online Bookstore: Books, NOOK ebooks, Music, Movies & Toys | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can hover over Hobbiee and Collectbables..........................undefined And user can click on Marvel Comics link....................................undefined When user lands on new page "Marvel Comics, Special Collections, Hobbies & Collectibles | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can click on POP Marvel Deadpool Bobblehead.......................undefined When user lands on Deadpool page "POP Marvel (BOBBLE): Deadpool | 830395030524 | Item | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can click Add to Bag button.......................................undefined And user can click on View Bag button.......................................undefined When user lands on Shopping Bag Page, containing text "Order Summary".......undefined Then user can remove Deadpool from Bag......................................undefined

testcase.classname: Barnes and Noble Login, navigation and purchase functionality.
testcase.name: 2. As a valid user, user can log in, search for a specific product via searchbar, add to bag, and checkout
testcase.skipped: Given user is able to browse to the Barnes and Noble Website................undefined When user lands on home page "Online Bookstore: Books, NOOK ebooks, Music, Movies & Toys | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can click on the sign in button...................................undefined And enter "axelajp@gmail.com" as email address..............................undefined And enter "Watermelons1" as password........................................undefined And click on login button...................................................undefined When user is logged into the "Online Bookstore: Books, NOOK ebooks, Music, Movies & Toys | Barnes & Noble".undefined Then user can click on search bar and search for The Zombie Survival Guide..undefined And user clicks on Zombie Survival Guide link...............................undefined When user lands on "The Zombie Survival Guide: Complete Protection from the Living Dead" page.undefined Then user clicks NOOKBOOK option............................................undefined And user clicks Add to Bag button...........................................undefined And user clicks view bag button.............................................undefined When user lands on Shopping Bag Page, containing text "Order Summary".......undefined Then click continue button..................................................undefined
